Description: 2014 Gibson Les Paul Standard Plus Brilliant Red El. Guitar w/Case #140065111 Up for sale a 2014 Gibson Les Paul Standard Plus Brilliant Red Electric Guitar w/Case - #140065111!  This instrument is a Used Model in Very Good Plus Cosmetic Condition and in Perfect Playing Condition.  One this one, there are two tiny dents/paint chips on the back of the neck and on the lower body side (see 17th and 22nd pictures) and there are some scratches, marks, few tiny dents, tiny nicks, finish deterioration and other signs of wear here and there (see 13th to 24th pictures), but really nothing major.  Unit comes with in its Gibson Historic Brown Hardshell Case. - All pictures are in the "Item Description" section of the listing - 2014 GIBSON LES PAUL STANDARD PLUS Experience the Comfort of the Modern Weight-Relieved Mahogany Body. Expand the Warm Burstbucker Pro Pickup Sound With Push-Pull Tuned Coil Tap Switches for Authentic Single Coil Tones, Phase Switching, and Pure Bypass. Experience Ultimate Stability and Sustain With Locking Keystone Grovers and Tune-O-Matic Bridge. Shine with Gorgeous Finishes over a Stunning AAAA Figured Maple Top. Play at the Speed of Sound with the Asymmetrical ’60S Slim-Taper Neck and Undercut Fret Over Binding. Accented with Cream-Colored Accessories and Gold Speed Knobs. SPECIFICATIONS: Body Top : Gread AAAA Figured Maple Body Back : Mahogany Adhesive : Franklin Titebond 50 Neck Species : Mahogany Profile : Asymetrical Neck Profile (.800 at 1st- .875 at 12th) Truss Rod : Standard Neck Joint : Angle : 5° (+/- 15 seconds) Adhesive : Franklin Titebond 50 Joint : Mortise & Tenon Adhesive : Franklin Titebond 50 Joint Angle : Tolerance+/- .005" Fingerboard Species : 1 Piece Rosewood Frets : Cryogenically Tempered, 22 Radius : 12" Nut/E.O.B : 1.695/2.260 Inlays : Figured Acrylic Trapezoid with 120th Banner Nut Material : TekToid Width : 1.695 Slots : Gibson PLEK System Headstock Silkscreen : Gold "Gibson" & "Les Paul Model" Truss Rod Cover : White "Standard" Script Tuners Model : Locking Grover Keystone Plating : Chrome Tuning Ratio : 18:1 Bridge Type : TonePros Locking Tune-o-Matic Plating : Chrome Tailpiece Type : TonePros Locking Stop Bar Plating : Chrome Knobs : Gold Speed Knobs Pickguard : None Control Plate : Cream Trim Rings : Cream Strap Buttons : Aluminum Pickups: - Neck Position : Rhythm BurstBucker Pro (Alnico #5) - Bridge Position : Lead BurstBucker Pro(Alnico #5) Potentiometers : 2 Push/Pull Volume Controls (Coil Splitting), 2 Push/Pull Tone Controls (Rhythm - Phase Shift, Lead - Bypass) Type : 500K Non-Linear Toggle Switch : Three-way Switchcraft with Cream Plastic Tip Output Jacks : ¼" mono Color : Brilliant Red Case Type : Hard Shell Exterior : Historic Brown w/Gibson Logo Interior : Pink Weight : 9.0 lbs / 4.2 kg All our items are fully verified by our pro technician and/or adjusted by our pro luthier before being very carefully packed by our pro service team here at the shop prior to shipment, buy with confidence! --------------------------------------------------------------------- Canadian customers must pay any applicable sales taxes.
